_sText:
~~~~~~~~~~CAPTURED~~~~~~~~~~~

Hello all, I got tired of standard CSS maps, so I created the following.


The Plot:

  You were on an undercover recon mission, when something went terribly wrong.  The last thing you remember was being knocked over the head HARD.  You awake in a dark room with only a pistol and a knife...

Basically, this map is one big puzzle/race. =)
The puzzles are challenging, but not super hard, so everyone can solve them.

The puzzles are as follows:
1st room: a lightswitch and a dark room, and a door

2nd room: a locked door with a keypad

3rd room: 7 teleports... pick the right one, or you might face certain death ;)

4th room: Completely WHITE room, with a door hidden... somewhere.

The 5th and last room: A buyzone and a teleport to the other team's spawn...you know... to sneak up on them from behind ;)

So you want to be the team to get through the puzzle first and get to the other team and slaughter em :P  

Have fun =)

**If you find any bugs/glitches be sure to let me know, and yes I did already do a test on the map.**

Thanks =P
